Question: This person bought a share of the Los Angeles Rams football team in 1947 with Bing Crosby and sold it in 1962.
Hints: This person rescued Eltham Little Theatre from closure by providing funds to buy the property.
A golf club became an integral prop for this person during the stand-up segments of his television specials and USO shows.
On July 27, 2003, two months after his 100th birthday, this person died at his home in Toluca Lake, Los Angeles.
